name: PulseLabsProfessor
0:
”Alexa, open pulse labs professor”
”be contextual”
”be adaptable”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pulse labs professor
des:
Pulse Labs Professor delivers expert advice to help you create winning voice-first experiences. Learn about three core principles of voice design that differentiate voice interfaces from visual ones, then take our short quiz. When you're done, drop by our booth (505) at the Alexa Conference on January 15-17, 2019 in Chattanooga with the secret word for a chance to win an Echo Show and expert voice content!

Pulse Labs is the premier testing solution for developers in the voice ecosystem (Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Cortana, etc...). Pulse Labs provides a testing platform and panel of testers for generating UX feedback on voice applications. Developers and designers of these voice applications can test what they've built on real users from any target demographic, obtaining insights that let them build applications their users will love.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
